channel.title: Cool Ducker Effects I wanted to share
channel.description: I'm not sure if I just didn't know this. But you can create whatever ducker you want using a kick drum with the volume all the way down, then simply set the pattern. In order for this to work set your duck in settings to duck on kick. Here are some examples I created: https://app.auxy.co/projects/Zdk9PNdLoCm0v2xEiBwuvA==

Read full topic

item.title: Cool Ducker Effects I wanted to share
item.dc:creator: therealejoc
item.description:
I’m not sure if I just didn’t know this. But you can create whatever ducker you want using a kick drum with the volume all the way down, then simply set the pattern. In order for this to work set your duck in settings to duck on kick. Here are some examples I created: https://app.auxy.co/projects/Zdk9PNdLoCm0v2xEiBwuvA==

Read full topic
item.source: Cool Ducker Effects I wanted to share
